00009 /**
00010  * systemwide locking mechanism with timeout for critical sections or eventhandlers
00011  *
00012  * @package kata_utility
00013  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00014  * @author sven.bender@gameforge.de
00015  */
00016 class LockUtility {
00017          /**
00018           * @var integer seconds to wait until we timeout
00019           */
00020          private $timeout= 10;
00021 
00022          /**
00023           * @var array holds lock-status
00024           */
00025          private $locks= array ();
00026 
00027          /**
00028           * @param integer $timout how many seconds to wait for a lock before we fail
00029           */
00030          public function setTimeout($timeout) {
00031                   if (is_numeric($timeout) && ($timeout > 0)) {
00032                            $this->timeout= $timeout;
00033                            return true;
00034                   }
00035                   return false;
00036          }
00037 
00038          /**
00039           * Lock a user id
00040           *
00041           * @param int $id, id of the user to lock.
00042           * @param bool $waitForTimeout, wait for time out
00043           * @return bool, returns true if the user was locked
00044           */
00045          function lock($id, $waitForTimeout= true) {
00046                   if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00047                            return true;
00048                   }
00049 
00050                   $timeout= time() + $this->timeout;
00051                   $lockname= KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id);
00052                   $fplock= null;
00053 
00054                   kataMakeTmpPath('sessions');
00055 
00056                   do {
00057                            if ($fplock= fopen($lockname, "w+")) {
00058                                     if (flock($fplock, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB)) {
00059                                              break;
00060                                     }
00061                                     if ($fplock) {
00062                                              fclose($fplock);
00063                                              $fplock= null;
00064                                     }
00065                            }
00066                            usleep(100000);
00067                   } while ((time() < $timeout) && $waitForTimeout);
00068 
00069                   if ($fplock) {
00070                            $this->locks[$id]= $fplock;
00071                            return true;
00072                   }
00073 
00074                   return false;
00075          }
00076 
00077          /**
00078           * Unlock a user id
00079           *
00080           * @param int $id, id of the user to lock
00081           * @return true if the user was unlocked
00082           */
00083          function unlock($id) {
00084                   if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00085                            return true;
00086                   }
00087 
00088                   if (!isset($this->locks[$id])) {
00089                            if (DEBUG > 0) {
00090                                     throw new Exception("user $userid not locked");
00091                            }
00092                            return false;
00093                   }
00094 
00095                   $fplock= $this->locks[$id];
00096                   flock($fplock, LOCK_UN);
00097                   fclose($fplock);
00098 
00099                   @ unlink(KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id));
00100                   unset ($this->locks[$id]);
00101                   return true;
00102          }
00103 
00104          function __destruct() {
00105                   if (count($this->locks) > 0) {
00106                            if (DEBUG > 0) {
00107                                     throw new Exception("these locks have not been unlocked:".print_r($this->locks, true));
00108                            }
00109                   }
00110          }
00111 
00112 }
